means: 身躯巨大笨重的人( hulk的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: Unemployment has soared as the hulks of fishing boats rust away on the salt - encrusted seabed.
sentence.Network_cn: 裸露的海床布满白花花的海盐渍,一艘艘锈迹斑斑的渔船搁浅其中,从而导致失业率急剧上升.

PerfectNetExp.abs: in the harbour the coal hulks show two lights one high on a mast , and one from the stern .海港里的煤船都亮起了两盏灯一盏在桅杆上，一盏在船尾。

由《战锤40k》改编战旗类游戏《太空战舰（space hulk）》最新截图曝光现实版《gta5》！
shear diagram 剪力图shear hulk 起重机船shear 剪

entry.tran: 巨大的残骸;大型废弃物
entry.def: The hulk of something is the large, ruined remains of it.

example.ex: ...the ruined hulk of the old church tower...
example.tran: 古老教堂钟楼的残垣断壁

example.ex: I could make out the gutted hulk of the tanker.
example.tran: 我可以辨认出油船破烂不堪的残骸。

entry.def: You use hulk to describe anything which is large and seems threatening to you.

example.ex: I followed his big hulk into the house.
example.tran: 我跟在他魁梧的身躯后面进了屋子。

auth_sentence.content: Can great rusting hulks find a place amid the glories of the Baroque?
auth_sentence.res_content: Can great rusting hulks find a place amid the glories of the Baroque?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Can great rusting hulks find a place amid the glories of the Baroque?

auth_sentence.content: Bullet casings litter the tangled undergrowth and vast hulks of rusty metal are just visible among the flowers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bullet casings litter the tangled undergrowth and vast hulks of rusty metal are just visible among the flowers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bullet casings litter the tangled undergrowth and vast hulks of rusty metal are just visible among the flowers.

auth_sentence.content: The lucky families who arrived early on during Syrian army's crackdown are holed up in the concrete hulks of unfinished homes.
auth_sentence.res_content: The lucky families who arrived early on during Syrian army's crackdown are holed up in the concrete hulks of unfinished homes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The lucky families who arrived early on during Syrian army's crackdown are holed up in the concrete hulks of unfinished homes.
